labels.label: This part we parse the JSON to get the genomics file to be backed up JSON: { "sampleID": "BF-23944", "technician": "James Smith", "instrumentType": "Illumina", "instrumentModel": "NextSeq 550Dx", "instrumentId": "NS-3042345", "reads": "9", "startTimeStamp": "2018-09-03:14:46:39", "endTimeStamp": "2018-09-03:21:58:02", }

Parse the json 1. Update Atlas 2. Create a csv file from the key attributes of the JSON 3. Hash the raw data and store the hash for audit We append a \n and merge content over 10 seconds.
A schema in hive that would reference the HDFS files would be able to query all items in this JSON
